name: Youtube1s, Youtube Multi Downloader Dark
description: Changes the general color scheme of "http://youtubemultidownloader.net/" to a dark variant. Inverts images to conserve brightness. DOES NOT APPLY TO "YOUTUBE".
additional_info:
15 January 2017 - Initial Release
---
Notes:
• Disables the "Disqus" comment section as it rarely updates and usually displays the same comments. Also uses a lot of screen estate (scrolling).
• Potentially misses some HTML elements - please let me know of any changes you would like to see.
• Future updates may include custom color schemes if this gets popular enough or if I have a free day.
